org.springframework.messaging.simp.user

Interface UserSessionRegistry

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultUserSessionRegistry

    public interface UserSessionRegistry
    A registry for looking up active session id's by user.

    Used in support of resolving unique session-specific user destinations. See DefaultUserDestinationResolver for more details.

    Since:
    4.0
    Author:
    Rossen Stoyanchev
    See Also:
    DefaultUserDestinationResolver

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Return the active session id's for the given user.
      void registerSessionId(String user, String sessionId)
      Register an active session id for the given user.
      void unregisterSessionId(String user, String sessionId)
      Unregister the session id for a user.

    • Method Detail

      • getSessionIds

        Set<String> getSessionIds(String user)
        Return the active session id's for the given user.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a set with 0 or more session id's
